devDependencies.heroku-prebuild: export NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false; export NODE_ENV=; NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false NODE_ENV=development npm install --only=dev --dev

scripts.l_cp: mkdir public\css && cp src\index.html public\index.html && cp src\css\styles.css public\css\styles.css
scripts.w_cp: mkdir public\css && copy src\index.html public\index.html && copy src\css\styles.css public\css\styles.css
